title: Dragon Ball Z Movie 13: Ryuuken Bakuhatsu!! Goku ga Yaraneba Dare ga Yaru
title_en: Dragon Ball Z Movie 13: Wrath of the Dragon
title_jp: ドラゴンボールＺ 龍拳爆発!!悟空がやらねば誰がやる
synopsis: The Z Warriors discover an unopenable music box and are told to open it with the dragon balls. The contents turn out to be a warrior named Tapion who had sealed himself inside along with a monster called Hildegarn. Goku must now perfect a new technique to defeat the evil monster.
